responses:
Welcome to Gen Garage!

I'm your friendly GENIE, at your service!

Here are some options for you to explore the website and know about it:
* About Gen Garage
* Missions of Gen Garage
* Leads of Gen Garage
* Current Projects
* Achievements
Gen Garage was founded in Mumbai in 2019. It is an innovative platform that brings together fresh graduates, interns, mentors, and industry leaders.

Gen Z Campus is a learning Initiative for Grade A in collaboration with I&D Gen Z Arena. The transformation program for grade A includes:

1. Immersive learning opportunities: The campus offers a series of essential self-paced learnings covering technical skills to developing leadership acumen.

2. Mentorship and guidance: Subject matter experts from various business lines will be available to mentor the young associates through-out their journey, offering valuable insights and constructive feedback.

3. Innovators space: The campus, in collaboration with the Gen Garage, also offers a dedicated space for brainstorming and creating solutions to real-world challenges faced by our clients.

To visit Gen Z Campus site and Learn, Click on the given link below:
Gen Z Campus

Previously known as Millennial Garage, it was founded in Mumbai in 2019. The new version called 'Gen Garage' with a federated model was launched in 2023.

responses:
Yes, it is mandatory to be a part of at least 1 club of Gen Garage. You can join in any number of clubs if you are interested. We have total of 6 clubs.

1. Mantri Club
2. Art Lens Club
3. Social Media Champs
4. Escape Club
5. Magic Pen
6. Falcon club

patterns: What is the Office / Work from Home hours for anyone in Gen Garage account
responses: The timings for anyone in Gen Garage are from 9 AM to 6:30 PM.

patterns: Till when one will be a part of Gen Garage
responses: One will be a part of Gen Garage until he/she gets a billing project.

patterns: Why it is necessary to join the sessions conducted by Gen Garage
responses: Because these sessions are conducted extensively for GenZs to gain knowledge about innovative technologies.

patterns: Gen Garage Sessions or Projects, which to prioritize
responses: Since you are a part of Gen Garage, it is your responsibility to give priority to Gen Garage sessions along with your project works.

responses: At Gen Garage, we're on a mission to foster a sense of belonging, purpose, and intent among our users.
